name: 林彥良
objective: This course is designed to improve your English in reading, speaking, listening, and writing. There will be frequent discussions and chances for you to speak up and express yourselves. Please do not be afraid to take part in group discussion—this is a pressure-free and friendly learning environment. All students are encouraged to reach out to your classmates, make friends with them, and learn together—in English!
schedule: A detailed syllabus will be distributed on the first day of class.
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam 15%
Final Exam 15% 
English Proficiency Exams 15% + 15%
Group Presentation 15%
In-class Quizzes 15%
Class Attendance & Participation: 10% 
(Three unexcused absences from class will result in automatic failure of the course.)
